description: Design system-focused handoff configuration for Magic Patterns emphasizing visual specifications and brand consistency

strategy.focus: design system + visual specifications + brand consistency
strategy.approach: Style layer analysis, focusing on visual design specifications and brand consistency

prompt_templates.base_template: Based on ${design_language}, create ${component_type} using ${aesthetic_style} style, color scheme: ${color_palette} (${color_values}), typography: ${font_specifications}, layout using ${layout_grid}, following ${spacing_system} spacing system

enterprise_dashboard.prompt:
Based on modern enterprise design language, create data dashboard interface following 8px grid system.

Design Specifications:
- Primary color: #2563EB (blue), Secondary color: #64748B (gray)
- Background: dark theme #0F172A, card background #1E293B
- Typography hierarchy: heading 24px/bold, values 32px/extra-bold, description 14px/regular
- Border radius: cards 12px, buttons 8px, icons 4px
- Shadows: cards use box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)
- Spacing: component spacing 24px, content padding 16px, grid gap 20px

Component Styles:
- Statistics cards: white/dark gray gradient background, left colored accent bar
- Charts: line thickness 2px, data points 6px circles
- Navigation: selected state uses primary color background, border radius 6px
- Icons: 24px, using Lucide icon library style

ecommerce_modern.prompt:
Based on modern e-commerce design system, create product grid interface:
- Use CSS Grid layout, desktop 3 columns, tablet 2 columns, mobile 1 column
- Card design: white background, border radius 8px, border 1px #E5E7EB
- Product images: aspect-ratio 1:1, object-fit cover
- Price typography: Semibold 18px, discounted price with strikethrough + red color
- Buttons: primary color #DC2626, hover darker #B91C1C, border radius 6px
- Spacing: card spacing 20px, content padding 16px
- Hover state: transform: translateY(-2px) + shadow elevation

social_glassmorphism.prompt:
Based on glassmorphism style, design social media interface:

Visual Specifications:
- Background: gradient linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)
- Cards: backdrop-filter: blur(20px), background rgba(255,255,255,0.1)
- Borders: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2)
- Border radius: 16px uniform radius
- Shadows: 0 8px 32px rgba(31, 38, 135, 0.37)

Component Design:
- Feed cards: semi-transparent white background with blur effect
- Buttons: gradient background + glassmorphism texture
- Avatars: circular + rainbow border gradient
- Icons: 24px, white semi-transparent
- Typography: Inter, white/semi-transparent hierarchy

quality_criteria.responsive_integrity: visual integrity across all screen sizes
